title: New World Cup Bracket Quarter Finals December 10th 2022

author: YoMySlime
text: I predict it's gonna be France and Morocco in the final.

author: TrashSmells
text: Idk if your serious or not but just saying they are playing next week so its not possible for them to be in the final.

author: YoMySlime
